metadata.description: Specifies the location in which to create the workspace.
Number of days to retain data.
Short name up to 12 characters for the Action group.

variables.mmaWindowsPolicyAssignmentDisplayName: (jumpstart) Configure Log Analytics extension on Azure Arc enabled Windows servers
variables.mmaLinuxPolicyAssignmentDisplayName: (jumpstart) Configure Log Analytics extension on Azure Arc enabled Linux servers
variables.depAgentWindowsPolicyAssignmentDisplayNa: (jumpstart) Configure Dependency agent on Azure Arc enabled Windows servers
variables.depAgentLinuxPolicyAssignmentDisplayName: (jumpstart) Configure Dependency agent on Azure Arc enabled Linux servers

parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| summarize by id, name

content.query:
Event
|  where EventLog in ("System","Application","Operations Manager")
| project EventLog,EventLevelName
| evaluate pivot(EventLevelName)
content.title: Windows Events - Summary

content.query:
Event
|  where EventLog == "{EventLog}" and EventID != 0
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h),EventLevelName
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Events count hourly distribution

content.query:
Event
|  where EventLog == "{EventLog}" and EventLevelName == "Error"
| summarize Count=count() by Computer, EventLog, EventLevelName
| sort by Count
content.title: Error Events

content.query:
Event
|  where EventLog == "{EventLog}" and EventLevelName == "Warning"
| summarize Count=count() by Computer, EventLog,EventLevelName
| sort by Count
content.title: Warning Events

content.query:
Event
|  where EventLog == "{EventLog}" and EventLevelName == "Information"
| summarize Count=count() by Computer, EventLog,EventLevelName
| sort by Count
content.title: Information Events

content.query:
Event
|  where EventLog == "{EventLog}" and EventLevelName == "{EventLevelName}" and Computer == "{Computer}" and EventID != 0
| project TimeGenerated,Computer, EventLog, ["Level"]=EventLevelName, ["Rendered Description"]=RenderedDescription
| sort by Computer, EventLog, ["Level"]
content.title: Event ID Description

parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| summarize by id, name

parameters.name: Counter
parameters.query:
Perf
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| summarize by CounterName, ObjectName, CounterText = CounterName
| order by ObjectName asc, CounterText asc
| project Counter = pack('counter', CounterName, 'object', ObjectName), CounterText, group = ObjectName

content.query:
let trend = ( Heartbeat
    | make-series InternalTrend=iff(count() > 0, 1, 0) default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step 15m by Computer
    | extend Trend=array_slice(InternalTrend, array_length(InternalTrend) - 30, array_length(InternalTrend)-1)); 

let PerfCPU = (Perf
    | where ObjectName == "Processor" and CounterName == "% Processor Time" and InstanceName=="_Total"
    | summarize AvgCPU=round(avg(CounterValue),2), MaxCPU=round(max(CounterValue),2) by Computer
    | extend StatusCPU = case (
                  AvgCPU > 80, 2,
                  AvgCPU > 50, 1,
                  AvgCPU <= 50, 0, -1
                )
    );

let PerfMemory = (Perf
    | where ObjectName == "Memory" and (CounterName == "Available MBytes" or CounterName == "Available MBytes Memory")
    | summarize AvgMEM=round(avg(CounterValue),2), MaxMEM=round(max(CounterValue),2) by Computer
    | extend StatusMEM = case (
                  AvgMEM > 4, 0,
                  AvgMEM >= 1, 1,
                  AvgMEM < 1, 2, -1
            )
    );

let PerfDisk = (Perf
    | where (ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" or ObjectName == "Logical Disk") and CounterName == "Free Megabytes" and (InstanceName =~ "C:" or InstanceName == "/")
    | summarize AvgDisk=round(avg(CounterValue),2), (TimeGenerated,LastDisk)=arg_max(TimeGenerated,round(CounterValue,2)) by Computer
    | extend StatusDisk = case (
                  AvgDisk < 5000, 2,
                  AvgDisk < 30000, 1,
                  AvgDisk >= 30000, 0,-1
)
    | project Computer, AvgDisk , LastDisk ,StatusDisk
    );
PerfCPU
| join (PerfMemory) on Computer
| join (PerfDisk) on Computer
| join (trend) on Computer
| project Computer,StatusCPU, AvgCPU,MaxCPU,StatusMEM,AvgMEM,MaxMEM,StatusDisk,AvgDisk,LastDisk, Trend
| sort by Computer
content.title: Top servers (data aggregated based on TimeRange)

content.query:
let TopComputers = Perf 
| where Computer contains "{Computer}" or "{Computer}"=="All"
| where ObjectName == 'Processor' and CounterName == '% Processor Time' and InstanceName == '_Total' 
| summarize AvgCPU = avg(CounterValue) by Computer 
| top 10 by AvgCPU desc
| project Computer; 
Perf 
| where Computer in (TopComputers) 
| where ObjectName == "Processor" and CounterName == "% Processor Time" and InstanceName == "_Total" 
| summarize Used_CPU = round(avg(CounterValue),1) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, ({TimeRange:end} - {TimeRange:start})/100)
| render timechart
content.title: % Processor Time - Top 10 Computers

content.query:
let trend = 
Perf           
| where Computer contains "{Computer}" or "{Computer}"=="All"
| where ObjectName == "Processor" and CounterName == "% Processor Time" and InstanceName == "_Total" 
| make-series Average = round(avg(CounterValue), 3) default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step totimespan('00:30:00') by Computer     
| project Computer, ['Trend'] = Average; 

Perf
| where Computer contains "{Computer}" or "{Computer}"=="All"
| where ObjectName == "Processor" and CounterName == "% Processor Time" and InstanceName == "_Total" 
| summarize Average=round(avg(CounterValue),3) by Computer
| join (trend) on Computer
| extend Status = case (
                  Average > 80, "Critical",
                  Average > 50, "Warning",
                  Average <= 50, "Healthy", "Unknown"
)

| project Status, Computer, Average, Trend
| sort by Average
content.title: Thresholds (Warning=50; Critical=80) - All Computers

content.json: ## Memory: _Available MBytes_ and _% Committed Bytes in Use_

content.query:
let TopComputers = Perf 
| where Computer contains "{Computer}" or "{Computer}"=="All"
| where ObjectName == "Memory" and (CounterName == "Available MBytes" or CounterName == "Available MBytes Memory" )
| summarize AvailableGBytes = round(avg(CounterValue)/1024,2) by Computer
| top 10 by AvailableGBytes asc
| project Computer; 
Perf 
| where Computer in (TopComputers) 
| where ObjectName == "Memory" and (CounterName == "Available MBytes" or CounterName == "Available MBytes Memory" )
| summarize AvailableGBytes = round(avg(CounterValue)/1024,2) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, ({TimeRange:end} - {TimeRange:start})/100)
| render timechart
content.title: Available MBytes - Top 10 Computers

content.query:
let trend = 
Perf           
| where Computer contains "{Computer}" or "{Computer}"=="All"
| where ObjectName == "Memory" and (CounterName == "Available MBytes" or CounterName == "Available MBytes Memory" )
| make-series Average = round(avg(CounterValue), 3) default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step totimespan('00:30:00') by Computer     
| project Computer, ['Trend'] = Average; 

Perf
| where Computer contains "{Computer}" or "{Computer}"=="All"
| where ObjectName == "Memory" and (CounterName == "Available MBytes" or CounterName == "Available MBytes Memory" )
| summarize ["Available GBytes"]=round(avg(CounterValue)/1024,2) by Computer
| join (trend) on Computer
| extend Status = case (
                  ["Available GBytes"] > 4, "Healthy",
                  ["Available GBytes"] >= 1, "Warning",
                  ["Available GBytes"] < 1, "Critical", "Unknown"
)
| project Status, Computer, ["Available GBytes"], Trend
| sort by ["Available GBytes"] asc
content.title: Thresholds (Warning < 4 GB; Critical < 1 GB) - All Computers

content.query:
let TopComputers = Perf 
| where Computer contains "{Computer}" or "{Computer}"=="All"
| where ObjectName == "Memory" and (CounterName == "% Committed Bytes In Use"  or CounterName == "% Used Memory")
| summarize PctCommittedBytes = round(avg(CounterValue),2) by Computer
| top 10 by PctCommittedBytes desc
| project Computer; 
Perf 
| where Computer in (TopComputers) 
| where ObjectName == "Memory" and (CounterName == "% Committed Bytes In Use"  or CounterName == "% Used Memory")
| summarize PctCommittedBytes = round(avg(CounterValue),2) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, ({TimeRange:end} - {TimeRange:start})/100)
| render timechart
content.title: % Committed Bytes In Use - Top 10 Computers

content.query:
let trend = 
Perf           
| where Computer contains "{Computer}" or "{Computer}"=="All"
| where ObjectName == "Memory" and (CounterName == "% Committed Bytes In Use" or CounterName=="% Used Memory")
| make-series Average = round(avg(CounterValue), 3) default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step totimespan('00:30:00') by Computer     
| project Computer, ['Trend'] = Average; 

Perf
| where Computer contains "{Computer}" or "{Computer}"=="All"
| where ObjectName == "Memory" and (CounterName == "% Committed Bytes In Use" or CounterName=="% Used Memory") 
| summarize Average=round(avg(CounterValue),3) by Computer
| join (trend) on Computer
| extend Status = case (
                  Average > 90, "Critical",
                  Average > 60, "Warning",
                  Average <= 60, "Healthy", "Unknown"
)

| project Status, Computer, Average, Trend
| sort by Average
content.title: Thresholds (Warning>60; Critical>90) - All Computers

content.json: ## Logical Disk: _Free Megabytes_ and _Avg read/write per sec_

content.query:
let TopDiscos = Perf 
| where Computer contains "{Computer}" or "{Computer}"=="All"
| where CounterName == "Free Megabytes" and (ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" or ObjectName == "Logical Disk")
| where (strlen(InstanceName) ==2 and InstanceName contains ":") or (InstanceName contains "/")
| extend Disco = strcat(InstanceName, " - ",Computer )
| summarize FreeSpace = round(avg(CounterValue),2) by Disco
| top 10 by FreeSpace asc
| project Disco; 
Perf 
| where CounterName == "Free Megabytes" and (ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" or ObjectName == "Logical Disk")
| where (strlen(InstanceName) ==2 and InstanceName contains ":") or (InstanceName contains "/")
| extend Disco = strcat(InstanceName, " - ",Computer)
| where Disco in (TopDiscos) 
| summarize FreeSpace = round(avg(CounterValue),2) by Disco, bin(TimeGenerated, ({TimeRange:end} - {TimeRange:start})/100)
content.title: Free Megabytes - Top 10 Computers-Volumes

content.query:
let trend = 
Perf           
| where Computer contains "{Computer}" or "{Computer}"=="All"
| where CounterName == "Free Megabytes" and (ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" or ObjectName == "Logical Disk")
| where (strlen(InstanceName) ==2 and InstanceName contains ":") or (InstanceName contains "/")
| extend Disco = strcat(InstanceName, " - ",Computer )
| make-series Average = round(avg(CounterValue), 3) default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step totimespan('00:30:00') by Disco     
| project Disco, ['Trend'] = Average; 

Perf
| where Computer contains "{Computer}" or "{Computer}"=="All"
| where CounterName == "Free Megabytes" and (ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" or ObjectName == "Logical Disk")
| where (strlen(InstanceName) ==2 and InstanceName contains ":") or (InstanceName contains "/")
| extend Disco = strcat(InstanceName, " - ",Computer )
| summarize Average=round(avg(CounterValue),2) by Disco,Computer,InstanceName
| join (trend) on Disco
| extend Status = case (
                  Average <5000, "Critical",
                  Average < 30000, "Warning",
                  Average >= 30000, "Healthy", "Unknown"
)

| project Status, Computer,Disk=InstanceName, Average, Trend
| sort by Average asc
content.title: Thresholds (Warning < 30GB; Critical < 5GB) - All Computers-Volumes

content.query:
let TopDiscos = Perf 
| where Computer contains "{Computer}" or "{Computer}"=="All"
| where CounterName == "Disk Reads/sec" and (ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" or ObjectName == "Logical Disk")
| where (strlen(InstanceName) ==2 and InstanceName contains ":") or ( InstanceName == "/")
| extend Disco = strcat(InstanceName, " - ",Computer )
| summarize MilliSeconds = avg(CounterValue) by Disco
| top 10 by MilliSeconds desc
| project Disco; 
Perf 
| where CounterName == "Disk Reads/sec" and (ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" or ObjectName == "Logical Disk")
| where (strlen(InstanceName) ==2 and InstanceName contains ":") or ( InstanceName == "/")
| extend Disco = strcat(InstanceName, " - ",Computer )
| where Disco in (TopDiscos) 
| summarize MilliSeconds = avg(CounterValue) by Disco, bin(TimeGenerated, ({TimeRange:end} - {TimeRange:start})/100)
| render timechart
content.title: Disk Reads/sec - Top 10 Computers-Volume

content.query:
let trend = 
Perf           
| where Computer contains "{Computer}" or "{Computer}"=="All"
| where (ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" or ObjectName=="Logical Disk") and CounterName == "Disk Reads/sec" and ((strlen(InstanceName) == 2 and InstanceName contains ":") or (InstanceName == "/"))
| extend Disco = strcat(InstanceName, " - ",Computer )
| make-series AVGReads = round(avg(CounterValue),2) default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step totimespan('00:30:00') by Disco     
| project Disco, ['Trend'] = AVGReads; 

Perf
| where Computer contains "{Computer}" or "{Computer}"=="All"
| where (ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" or ObjectName=="Logical Disk") and CounterName == "Disk Reads/sec" and ((strlen(InstanceName) == 2 and InstanceName contains ":") or (InstanceName == "/"))
| extend Disco = strcat(InstanceName, " - ",Computer )
| summarize AVGReads=round(avg(CounterValue),2) by Disco,Computer,InstanceName
| join (trend) on Disco
| extend Status = case (
                  AVGReads > 25, "Critical",
                  AVGReads > 15, "Warning",
                  AVGReads <= 15, "Healthy", "Unknown"
)
| project  Computer,Disk=InstanceName, ["Reads"]=AVGReads, Trend
| sort by ["Reads"] desc

let TopDiscos= Perf 
| where Computer contains "{Computer}" or "{Computer}"=="All"
| where CounterName == "Disk Writes/sec" and (ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" or ObjectName=="Logical Disk")
| where (strlen(InstanceName) ==2 and InstanceName contains ":") or InstanceName=="/"
| extend Disco = strcat(InstanceName, " - ",Computer )
| summarize MilliSeconds = avg(CounterValue) by Disco
| top 10 by MilliSeconds desc
| project Disco; 
Perf 
| where CounterName == "Disk Writes/sec" and (ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" or ObjectName=="Logical Disk")
| where (strlen(InstanceName) ==2 and InstanceName contains ":") or InstanceName=="/"
| extend Disco = strcat(InstanceName, " - ",Computer )
| where Disco in (TopDiscos) 
| summarize MilliSeconds = avg(CounterValue) by Disco, bin(TimeGenerated, ({TimeRange:end} - {TimeRange:start})/100)
| render timechart
content.title: Disk Writes/sec - Top 10 Computers-Volume

content.query:
let trend = 
Perf           
| where Computer contains "{Computer}"  or "{Computer}"=="All"
| where CounterName == "Disk Writes/sec" and (ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" or ObjectName=="Logical Disk")
| where (strlen(InstanceName) ==2 and InstanceName contains ":") or InstanceName=="/"
| extend Disco = strcat(InstanceName, " - ",Computer )
| make-series AVGWrites = round(avg(CounterValue),2) default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step totimespan('00:30:00') by Disco     
| project Disco, ['Trend'] = AVGWrites; 

Perf
| where Computer contains "{Computer}" or "{Computer}"=="All"
| where CounterName == "Disk Writes/sec" and (ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" or ObjectName=="Logical Disk")
| where (strlen(InstanceName) ==2 and InstanceName contains ":") or InstanceName=="/"
| extend Disco = strcat(InstanceName, " - ",Computer )
| summarize AVGWrites=round(avg(CounterValue),2) by Disco,Computer,InstanceName
| join (trend) on Disco
| extend Status = case (
                  AVGWrites > 25, "Critical",
                  AVGWrites > 15, "Warning",
                  AVGWrites <= 15, "Healthy", "Unknown"
)

| project  Computer,Disk=InstanceName, ["Writes"]=AVGWrites, Trend
| sort by ["Writes"] desc

let TopDiscos = Perf 
| where Computer contains "{Computer}" or "{Computer}"=="All"
| where CounterName == "Current Disk Queue Length" and (ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" or ObjectName=="Logical Disk")
| where (strlen(InstanceName) ==2 and InstanceName contains ":") or InstanceName=="/"
| extend Disco = strcat(InstanceName, " - ",Computer )
| summarize MilliSeconds = avg(CounterValue) by Disco
| top 10 by MilliSeconds desc
| project Disco; 
Perf 
| where CounterName == "Current Disk Queue Length" and (ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" or ObjectName=="Logical Disk")
| where (strlen(InstanceName) ==2 and InstanceName contains ":") or InstanceName=="/"
| extend Disco = strcat(InstanceName, " - ",Computer )
| where Disco in (TopDiscos) 
| summarize MilliSeconds = avg(CounterValue) by Disco, bin(TimeGenerated, ({TimeRange:end} - {TimeRange:start})/100)
| render timechart
content.title: Current Disk Queue Length - Top 10 Computers-Volume

content.query:
let trend = 
Perf           
| where Computer contains "{Computer}" or "{Computer}"=="All"
| where CounterName == "Current Disk Queue Length" and (ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" or ObjectName=="Logical Disk")
| where (strlen(InstanceName) ==2 and InstanceName contains ":") or InstanceName=="/"
| extend Disco = strcat(InstanceName, " - ",Computer )
| make-series AVGQueue = round(avg(CounterValue),2) default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step totimespan('00:30:00') by Disco     
| project Disco, ['Trend'] = AVGQueue; 

Perf
| where Computer contains "{Computer}" or "{Computer}"=="All"
| where CounterName == "Disk Writes/sec" and (ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" or ObjectName=="Logical Disk")
| where (strlen(InstanceName) ==2 and InstanceName contains ":") or InstanceName=="/"
| extend Disco = strcat(InstanceName, " - ",Computer )
| summarize AVGQueue=round(avg(CounterValue),2) by Disco,Computer,InstanceName
| join (trend) on Disco
| extend Status = case (
                  AVGQueue > 4, "Critical",
                  AVGQueue > 1, "Warning",
                  AVGQueue <= 1, "Healthy", "Unknown"
)

| project  Computer,Status,Disk=InstanceName, ["Queue"]=AVGQueue, Trend
| sort by ["Queue"] desc
content.title: Current Disk Queue Length

content.query:
let WindowsComputer = Heartbeat
    | where Computer contains "{Computer}" or "{Computer}"=="All"
    | where OSType == "Windows"
    | distinct Computer;
let TopComputers = Perf 
    | where Computer in (WindowsComputer)
    | where ObjectName == 'Processor' and CounterName == '% Processor Time' and InstanceName == '_Total' 
    | summarize AggregatedValue = avg(CounterValue) by Computer 
    | top 10 by AggregatedValue desc
    | project Computer; 
let FindCPU = Perf
| where Computer in (TopComputers)
    | where ObjectName == "Processor" and CounterName == "% Processor Time" 
    | where InstanceName != "_Total"
    | summarize CPUs=dcount(InstanceName) by Computer;
let ProcessUsage = Perf
| where Computer in (TopComputers)
    | where ObjectName == "Process" and CounterName == "% Processor Time"
    | where InstanceName != "_Total" and InstanceName != "Idle"
    | extend Process = iff(InstanceName contains "#",substring(InstanceName,0,indexof(InstanceName,"#",0)),InstanceName)
    | extend newTimeGenerated = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss")
    | summarize TotalCPU = sum(CounterValue) by Computer, newTimeGenerated, Process
    | summarize average = avg(TotalCPU) by Computer, Process;
ProcessUsage | join kind= inner (
    FindCPU
) on Computer 
| project ParentId = Computer, Id = Process, AvgUsage = average/CPUs
| extend Name = strcat(' ', Id)
| union (
Perf
| where Computer in (TopComputers)
    | where ObjectName == "Processor" and CounterName == "% Processor Time"
    | where InstanceName != "_Total" and Computer in (WindowsComputer)
    | summarize AvgUsage = avg(CounterValue) by Id = Computer
    | extend ParentId = '', Name = strcat(' ', Id))
| project Name, AvgUsage = round(AvgUsage, 2) , Id, ParentId
| order by AvgUsage
content.title: %CPU Usage by Process (Windows) - Top 10 Computers

content.query:
VMConnection
| where Computer contains "{Computer}" or "{Computer}"=="All"
| summarize TotalMB = sum(BytesSent+BytesReceived)/1024/1024  by ParentId = Computer, Id = ProcessName
| extend Name = strcat(' ', Id)
| union (
    VMConnection
    | where Computer contains "{Computer}" or "{Computer}"=="All"
    | summarize TotalMB = sum(BytesSent+BytesReceived)/1024/1024 by Id = Computer
    | extend ParentId = '', Name = strcat(' ', Id)
    )
    | project Name, TotalMB, Id, ParentId
    | order by TotalMB
content.title: Amount of Network Traffic (in MBytes) by Process (VMConnection)

parameters.name: ResourceGroups
parameters.label: Resource groups
parameters.query:
Resources
| summarize by resourceGroup
| order by resourceGroup asc
| project id=resourceGroup, resourceGroup

parameters.name: ResourceTypes
parameters.label: Resource types
parameters.query:
where "*" in ({ResourceGroups}) or resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroups})
| summarize by type
| project type, label=type

parameters.name: Resources
parameters.query:
Resources
| where "*" in ({ResourceTypes}) or type in~({ResourceTypes})
| where '*' in~({ResourceGroups}) or resourceGroup in~({ResourceGroups}) 
| order by name asc
| extend Rank = row_number()
| project value = id, label = name, selected = Rank <= 10, group = resourceGroup

content.query:
AlertsManagementResources 
| where type =~ 'microsoft.alertsmanagement/alerts'
| where properties.essentials.startDateTime {timeRange}  
| where properties.essentials.actionStatus.isSuppressed == false
| extend Severity=tostring(properties.essentials.severity)
| extend State=tostring(properties.essentials.alertState)
| extend comp = properties.context.context.condition.allOf[0].dimensions
| mvexpand comp
| where comp.name == 'Computer' or comp.name == 'TestConfigurationName' or isnull(comp)
| where "*" in ({State}) or State in ({State})
| where "*" in ({ResourceTypes}) or properties.essentials.targetResourceType in~ ({ResourceTypes})
| where "*" in ({ResourceGroups}) or properties.essentials.targetResourceGroup in~ ({ResourceGroups})
| where "*" in ({Resources}) or properties.essentials.targetResource in~ ({Resources})
| project AlertId=id, StartTime=todatetime(tostring(properties.essentials.startDateTime)), Name=name, Severity, State=tostring(properties.essentials.alertState), MonitorCondition=tostring(properties.essentials.monitorCondition), SignalType=tostring(properties.essentials.signalType), TargetResource = split(comp.value, '.')[0]
| order by StartTime desc
content.title: Azure Monitor alerts

allOf.query: Event | where (EventID == 6008 and Source =="EventLog") or (EventID == 1074 and Source == "User32" and (RenderedDescription has "shutdown" or RenderedDescription has "power off"))

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let trend = ( Heartbeat
    | make-series InternalTrend=iff(count() > 0, 1, 0) default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step 15m by Computer
    | extend Trend=array_slice(InternalTrend, array_length(InternalTrend) - 30, array_length(InternalTrend)-1)); 

let PerfCPU = (Perf
    | where ObjectName == "Processor" and CounterName == "% Processor Time" and InstanceName=="_Total"
    | summarize AvgCPU=round(avg(CounterValue),2), MaxCPU=round(max(CounterValue),2) by Computer
    | extend StatusCPU = case (
                  AvgCPU > 80, 2,
                  AvgCPU > 50, 1,
                  AvgCPU <= 50, 0, -1
                )
    );

let PerfMemory = (Perf
    | where ObjectName == "Memory" and (CounterName == "Available MBytes" or CounterName == "Available MBytes Memory")
    | summarize AvgMEM=round(avg(CounterValue),2), MaxMEM=round(max(CounterValue),2) by Computer
    | extend StatusMEM = case (
                  AvgMEM > 4, 0,
                  AvgMEM >= 1, 1,
                  AvgMEM < 1, 2, -1
            )
    );

let PerfDisk = (Perf
    | where (ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" or ObjectName == "Logical Disk") and CounterName == "Free Megabytes" and (InstanceName =~ "C:" or InstanceName == "/")
    | summarize AvgDisk=round(avg(CounterValue),2), (TimeGenerated,LastDisk)=arg_max(TimeGenerated,round(CounterValue,2)) by Computer
    | extend StatusDisk = case (
                  AvgDisk < 5000, 2,
                  AvgDisk < 30000, 1,
                  AvgDisk >= 30000, 0,-1
)
    | project Computer, AvgDisk , LastDisk ,StatusDisk
    );
PerfCPU
| join (PerfMemory) on Computer
| join (PerfDisk) on Computer
| join (trend) on Computer
| project Computer,StatusCPU, AvgCPU,MaxCPU,StatusMEM,AvgMEM,MaxMEM,StatusDisk,AvgDisk,LastDisk, Trend
| sort by Computer ","size":0,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"Top servers (data aggregated based on TimeRange)","timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","exportFieldName":"Computer","exportParameterName":"Computer","exportDefaultValue":"All","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{Workspace}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"StatusCPU","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"0","representation":"success","text":"{1}"},{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"1","representation":"2","text":"{1}"},{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"2","representation":"4","text":"{1}"},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"Unknown","text":"{1}"}]}},{"columnMatch":"AvgCPU","formatter":0,"formatOptions":{},"numberFormat":{"unit":1,"options":{"style":"decimal"}}},{"columnMatch":"MaxCPU","formatter":0,"formatOptions":{},"numberFormat":{"unit":1,"options":{"style":"decimal"}}},{"columnMatch":"StatusMEM","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"0","representation":"success","text":"{1}"},{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"1","representation":"2","text":"{1}"},{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"2","representation":"critical","text":"{1}"},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"unknown","text":"{1}"}]}},{"columnMatch":"AvgMEM","formatter":0,"formatOptions":{},"numberFormat":{"unit":38,"options":{"style":"decimal","maximumFractionDigits":2}}},{"columnMatch":"MaxMEM","formatter":0,"formatOptions":{},"numberFormat":{"unit":38,"options":{"style":"decimal","maximumFractionDigits":2}}},{"columnMatch":"StatusDisk","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"0","representation":"success","text":"{1}"},{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"1","representation":"2","text":"{1}"},{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"2","representation":"4","text":"{1}"},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"success","text":"{1}"}]}},{"columnMatch":"AvgDisk","formatter":0,"formatOptions":{},"numberFormat":{"unit":38,"options":{"style":"decimal","maximumFractionDigits":2}}},{"columnMatch":"LastDisk","formatter":0,"formatOptions":{},"numberFormat":{"unit":4,"options":{"style":"decimal","maximumFractionDigits":2}}},{"columnMatch":"Trend","formatter":10,"formatOptions":{"palette":"blue"}},{"columnMatch":"Max","formatter":0,"formatOptions":{},"numberFormat":{"unit":0,"options":{"style":"decimal"}}},{"columnMatch":"Average","formatter":8,"formatOptions":{"palette":"yellowOrangeRed"},"numberFormat":{"unit":0,"options":{"style":"decimal","useGrouping":false}}},{"columnMatch":"Min","formatter":8,"formatOptions":{"palette":"yellowOrangeRed","aggregation":"Min"},"numberFormat":{"unit":0,"options":{"style":"decimal"}}}],"sortBy":[{"itemKey":"$gen_number_AvgCPU_2","sortOrder":2}],"labelSettings":[{"columnId":"Computer"},{"columnId":"StatusCPU","label":"CPU"},{"columnId":"AvgCPU","label":"CPU (avg)"},{"columnId":"MaxCPU","label":"CPU (max)"},{"columnId":"StatusMEM","label":"Memory"},{"columnId":"AvgMEM","label":"Memory (avg)"},{"columnId":"MaxMEM","label":"Memory inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"AlertsManagementResources 
| where type =~ 'microsoft.alertsmanagement/alerts'
| where properties.essentials.startDateTime {timeRange}  
| where properties.essentials.actionStatus.isSuppressed == false
| extend Severity=tostring(properties.essentials.severity)
| extend State=tostring(properties.essentials.alertState)
| extend comp = properties.context.context.condition.allOf[0].dimensions
| mvexpand comp
| where comp.name == 'Computer' or comp.name == 'TestConfigurationName' or isnull(comp)
| where "*" in ({State}) or State in ({State})
| where "*" in ({ResourceTypes}) or properties.essentials.targetResourceType in~ ({ResourceTypes})
| where "*" in ({ResourceGroups}) or properties.essentials.targetResourceGroup in~ ({ResourceGroups})
| where "*" in ({Resources}) or properties.essentials.targetResource in~ ({Resources})
| project AlertId=id, StartTime=todatetime(tostring(properties.essentials.startDateTime)), Name=name, Severity, State=tostring(properties.essentials.alertState), MonitorCondition=tostring(properties.essentials.monitorCondition), SignalType=tostring(properties.essentials.signalType), TargetResource = split(comp.value, '.')[0]
| order by StartTime desc
","size":0,"title":"Azure Monitor alerts","queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"AlertId","formatter":5},{"columnMatch":"StartTime","formatter":6},{"columnMatch":"Name","formatter":1,"formatOptions":{"linkTarget":"OpenBlade","linkIsContextBlade":true,"bladeOpenContext":{"bladeName":"AlertDetailsTemplateBlade","extensionName":"Microsoft_Azure_Monitoring","bladeParameters":[{"name":"alertId","source":"column","value":"AlertId"},{"name":"alertName","source":"column","value":"Name"},{"name":"invokedFrom","source":"static","value":"Workbooks"}]}},"tooltipFormat":{"tooltip":"View alert details"}},{"columnMatch":"Severity","formatter":11},{"columnMatch":"State","formatter":1},{"columnMatch":"MonitorCondition","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"Fired","representation":"Fired","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"Resolved","representation":"Resolved","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"success","text":"{0}{1}"}]}},{"columnMatch":"TargetResource","formatter":13,"formatOptions":{"linkTarget":null,"showIcon":true}},{"columnMatch":"ResourceType","formatter":16,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true}},{"columnMatch":"Resource Type","formatter":11},{"columnMatch":"essentials","formatter":5}]}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"Event
|  where EventLog in ("System","Application","Operations Manager")
| project EventLog,EventLevelName
| evaluate pivot(EventLevelName)","size":1,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"Windows Events - Summary","timeContext":{"durationMs":0},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","exportFieldName":"EventLog","exportParameterName":"EventLog","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{Workspace}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"Information","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true,"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"info","text":"{0}{1}"}],"aggregation":"Unique"},"numberFormat":{"unit":0,"options":{"style":"decimal"}}},{"columnMatch":"Warning","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true,"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"warning","text":"{0}{1}"}],"aggregation":"Unique"},"numberFormat":{"unit":0,"options":{"style":"decimal"}}},{"columnMatch":"Error","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true,"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"3","text":"{0}{1}"}],"aggregation":"Unique"},"numberFormat":{"unit":0,"options":{"style":"decimal"}}}]}}
